title: Crowdtilt
description:
The Crowdtilt API opens up the opportunity for developers to:
Offer a group payments option in their applications.Offer a pre-sales commerce option in their applications.Develop a crowdfunding application (i.e., single project model like Lockitron
or multi-project model like Kickstarter).Develop a social fundraising application.Enable the collaboration around these styles of commerce.
